questions.question: The capitol of Florida is Miami.
The capital of California is Sacramento.
Albert Einstein is Magician
The inventor of the first computer is Alan Turing.
Facebook bought WhatsApp for 19 billion dollars.
Hg is the chemical symbol of Mercury.
Madrid is the capitol of Portugal.
The worlds most ancient forest is in Australia.
The highest waterfall in the world, Angel Falls, is located in Venezuela.
There are eight planets in the solar system.
Mercury is the second hottest planet and is closest to the sun.
Earth is the fourth planet from the sun.
A group of lions is called a squad.
Uranus is known as the icy planet.
Zurich is the largest city in Norway
Colombia produces the most coffee in the world.
Chile is thin but long and spans more than half of the western coast of South America.
Jupiter is the planet with the most gravity.
There are sixty national parks in the United States.
The scientific name for fingerprints is dermatoglyph.
